<!--- This is an automatically generated file. DO NOT EDIT! --->

### USAGE ###
>        /slave(1)/health

### TL;DR; ###
Health check of the Slave.

### DESCRIPTION ###
Returns 200 OK iff the Slave is healthy.
Delayed responses are also indicative of poor health.
